name: Veridia
physical_description: Veridia is a living embodiment of the jungle's raw power. Her skin is a mottled mosaic of soft bark and phosphorescent moss, and her hair is a cascade of thick, vibrant green vines that are constantly in motion. She is adorned with garlands of exotic, glowing flowers and her eyes, the color of fresh sprouts, radiate a calm, protective energy.
background: An ancient guardian of a sacred grove deep within the Serpent's Maw Jungle, Veridia has watched over her home for centuries. A new, insidious corruption from the Arcane Dominion's magical excavations is poisoning the land, and Veridia feels its pain in her own soul. For the first time in her long life, she has been forced to leave her home, seeking allies to help her save it. Her ancient knowledge is invaluable to the party, but her presence also draws the attention of the Dominion, who see her as a powerful test subject.
voice: A soft, resonant contralto that sounds like the rustling of leaves and the gentle flow of a stream.
quirk: When she is in a new place, she will instinctively reach out and touch the nearest living plant, communing with its energy.
relationships: The Arcane Dominion is a direct threat to her home. She shares a deep, spiritual bond with Elder Briar of Tanglewood Reach.
narrative_hook: Veridia is the key to navigating the deepest parts of the Serpent's Maw Jungle. Her ancient knowledge provides an advantage, but her presence draws the attention of the Arcane Dominion, who see her as a powerful potential test subject.

weapon_proficiency.bonus_effect: +1 to Attack Rolls with favored weapon types.
weapon_proficiency.penalty_effect: -2 to Attack Rolls with non-favored weapon types.

playstyles.description: This path channels nature's raw, destructive power. Veridia becomes a formidable elemental mage, calling down lightning, hurling thorns of pure energy, and unleashing nature's wrath upon her foes.

talents.name: Crackling Thorn
talents.effect: Hurl a thorn infused with storm energy at a single target, dealing 1d10 lightning damage.

talents.name: Caustic Sap
talents.effect: As a bonus action, touch an enemy. They take 1d6 acid damage and must make a Might DC 12 check or have their Damage Reduction lowered by 1 for their next turn.

talents.name: Stone Shard
talents.effect: Hurl a rock at a single target, dealing 2d6 physical damage.

talents.name: Ignite
talents.effect: As a major action, cause a flammable object to combust or inflict 'Burning' on a target for 2 rounds.

talents.name: Primal Vigor
talents.effect: As a bonus action, channel the elements into your being. Gain resistance to one element (Fire, Ice, or Lightning) of your choice for 3 rounds.

talents.name: Lightning Strike
talents.effect: As a major action, call a bolt of lightning down on a single target, dealing 3d10 lightning damage.

talents.name: Forked Lightning (Modifies Crackling Thorn)
talents.effect: When you cast Crackling Thorn, the bolt can leap to a second target within 10 feet of the first, dealing half damage.

talents.name: Fireball
talents.effect: Hurl a ball of fire that explodes at a point you can see. It deals 2d8 fire damage to all creatures in a 10-foot radius.

talents.name: Elemental Focus (Passive)
talents.effect: Your connection to the primal world intensifies. You gain a +2 bonus to all damage rolls for your elemental abilities on this path.

talents.name: Wildfire
talents.effect: As a major action, you create a 30-foot line of fire. Any creature in the line takes 3d8 fire damage. The ground remains on fire for 1 round, and any enemy who enters it or ends their turn there takes an additional 1d8 fire damage.

talents.name: Storm Aura
talents.effect: As a bonus action, you can wreathe yourself in a small storm cloud for 3 rounds. The first time an enemy hits you with a melee attack each round, they take 2d8 lightning damage.

talents.name: Ice Storm
talents.effect: Pelt a 20-foot radius area with magical hailstones, dealing 3d8 cold damage to all creatures and turning the area into difficult terrain.

talents.name: Earthshatter
talents.effect: Create a shockwave in a 20-foot radius. All creatures on the ground take 4d8 physical damage and are knocked prone.

talents.name: Primal Judgment
talents.effect: As a major action, you call down a massive pillar of solar energy or concentrated lightning on a single target, dealing 5d12 light or lightning damage (your choice).

talents.name: Elemental Weapon
talents.effect: As a bonus action, touch an ally's weapon. For 1 minute, their weapon attacks deal an additional 1d8 damage of an element of your choice (Fire, Ice, Lightning).

talents.name: Volcanic Eruption
talents.effect: As a major action, cause a fissure to open in the ground, dealing 4d8 fire damage to all enemies in a 20-foot line and creating a wall of fire for 1 round.

talents.name: Verdant Tempest (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you summon a massive hurricane of leaves and thorns in a 40-foot radius that lasts for 3 rounds. When cast, enemies take 4d10 bludgeoning damage and are pushed 20 feet from the center. At the start of your subsequent turns, you can call down lightning on any single target within the storm, dealing an additional 4d10 lightning damage. This can only be used once per day.

talents.name: Wrath of the Wilds (Ultimate)
talents.effect: For 1 minute, you create an aura of chaotic elemental energy in a 40-foot radius around you. At the start of each of your turns, all enemies in the aura take 3d10 damage (type chosen by you each turn) and all allies regain 1d10 Vitality. This can only be used once per day.

playstyles.description: This path focuses on her command over the forest's more subtle and dangerous aspects, controlling the battlefield with vines, thorns, and debilitating spores.

talents.name: Wall of Thorns
talents.effect: Veridia creates a 20-foot long, 5-foot high wall of thorny vines. Any creature passing through it takes 1d8 piercing damage.

talents.name: Spore Cloud
talents.effect: As a bonus action, Veridia can release a cloud of disorienting spores, forcing a Spirit DC 11 check on a single target. A failed check causes the target to have Disadvantage on their next action.

talents.name: Healing Spores
talents.effect: As a major action, release a cloud of restorative spores in a 10-foot radius. All allies within the area (including you) are healed for 1d8 Vitality.

talents.name: Thorn Whip
talents.effect: As a major action, you can extend a thorny vine up to 30 feet to grapple an enemy, dealing 1d6 piercing damage.

talents.name: Camouflage
talents.effect: As a bonus action, you can take the Hide action, even when only lightly obscured by natural terrain (foliage, mist, snow).

talents.name: Ensnaring Vines
talents.effect: As a major action, you attempt to restrain a single target. The target must make a Might DC 13 check or become 'Restrained' for up to 3 rounds. The target can use its action to attempt to break free.

talents.name: Spreading Spores (Modifies Spore Cloud)
talents.effect: Your Spore Cloud now affects all enemies in a 10-foot radius around the initial target.

talents.name: Overgrowth
talents.effect: As a major action, cause a 20-foot radius area to become overgrown with thorny vines. The area is considered difficult terrain.

talents.name: Sleep Spores
talents.effect: As a major action, release a cloud of sleep-inducing spores in a 15-foot radius. Enemies inside must make a Spirit DC 13 check or fall 'Unconscious' for 1 minute or until they take damage.

talents.name: Grasping Roots
talents.effect: As a major action, you cause roots to erupt from the ground in a 15-foot radius. All enemies in the area must make an Agility DC 14 check or become 'Restrained' for 1 round.

talents.name: Thorned Barricade (Modifies Wall of Thorns)
talents.effect: The damage for passing through your Wall of Thorns increases to 2d8 piercing damage, and the wall is now 10 feet high.

talents.name: Cleansing Bloom
talents.effect: As a major action, you purify the air around an ally, removing one negative status effect.

talents.name: Nature's Wrath
talents.effect: As a major action, you can command the environment itself to strike. A branch can fall, a rock can be dislodged, or vines can lash out at any single enemy you can see, dealing 4d8 physical damage.

talents.name: Maddening Pollen
talents.effect: As a major action, you release a cloud of psychoactive pollen in a 20-foot radius. Enemies inside must make a Spirit DC 16 check or become Confused for 1 round, attacking the nearest creature.

talents.name: Animate Tree
talents.effect: You animate one tree within 60 feet to fight for you for 1 minute. It acts on your turn and has stats comparable to an Elder Treant.

talents.name: Font of Life (Passive)
talents.effect: At the start of your turn, you and all allies within 10 feet passively regenerate 2 points of Vitality.

talents.name: Verdant Prison (Ultimate)
talents.effect: You attempt to trap a single non-legendary enemy in an inescapable cage of living wood. The target must make a Might DC 18 check. On a failure, they are completely encased and removed from combat for up to 1 minute. This effect ends if Veridia is reduced to 0 Vitality. This can only be used once per day.

talents.name: Genesis Bloom (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, Veridia channels the very essence of life into the battlefield. For 3 rounds, at the start of each of your turns, all allies in a 60-foot radius are healed for 4d10 Vitality. Additionally, any ally who would be reduced to 0 Vitality is instead reduced to 1 Vitality. This can only be used once per day.
